outputs.output_descr: A full-fledged NHDR  on Informal economy, with a focus on how this relates to human development and a description of the policy framework and necessary actions to move towards a reduction of the informal economy scale and is fully consistent with advancing human development

project_descr: A full-fledged NHDR  on Informal economy, with a focus on how this relates to human development and a description of the policy framework to move towards a reduction of the informal economy scale
project_title: NHDR - Informal economy: overcoming economic exclusion
